buttonType.description:
Enum of supported prop types. Used internally only.
@ignore

element.description: The rendered element, like an `<a />` or `<Link />`

innerRef.description: Ref-setting function, or ref created by useRef, passed to the button element

leftIcon.description: Icon shown to the left of the label

rightIcon.description: Icon shown to the right of the label

condensed.description: Condensed modifier. Use in condensed designs

disabled.description: Disable a button in certain situations

element.description: The rendered element, like an `<a />` or `<Link />`

icon.description: Task icon, show to the left of the label

innerRef.description: Ref-setting function, or ref created by useRef, passed to the button element

className.description: Extra class name applied in addition to the FFE classes

thin.description: Applies the thin modifier to remove margins

inline.description: Applies the inline modifier to make all child buttons inline

disabled.description: Disable a button in certain situations

disabled.description: Disable a button in certain situations

ghost.description: Applies the ghost modifier if true.

closeLabel.description: An accessible label for the close-button, only shown in the "isExpanded" state

leftIcon.description: Icon shown to the left of the label

rightIcon.description: Icon shown to the right of the label

innerRef.description: Ref-setting function, or ref created by useRef, passed to the button element

isExpanded.description: When true the component will render a circle with an X indicating whatever is controlled is in an expanded state.

onClick.description: Use to listen for clicks and toggle the `isExpanded` property together with whatever it is you're expanding.

children.description: Text that should reflect the isExpanded state.
